customer_metadata.user-script: /usr/sbin/mdata-get root_authorized_keys > ~root/.ssh/authorized_keys; yum install -y https://repo.saltstack.com/yum/redhat/salt-repo-latest.el7.noarch.rpm; yum install -y salt-minion git; systemctl enable salt-minion; /usr/sbin/mdata-get sdc:hostname > /etc/hostname; /usr/sbin/mdata-get sdc:hostname > /etc/salt/minion_id; systemctl disable firewalld
